verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
D
All through the day
All through the night
Dwell in His promises
Walk in His light
Darkness will flee
At His command
All through the day and night
We're in His hand

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You have a friend
He waits for you
Watching to see
Just what you'll do
You'll only find your strength
Within His mighty calm
And with His joy
Your life will be a Psalm

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Tell Him your cares
Confess your doubts
He works within
To work it out
His Word will comfort you
His love is a healing balm
And with His joy
Your life will be a Psalm
